name: Free Tour Mysteries and Legends of Belfast (Available in Spanish)
description:
The streets of Belfast are home to countless mysteries and legends.

Discover the darkest history of Belfast, stories of murders and crimes from the Victorian era, executions, ghosts, mythological beings...

We will meet next to the sculpture of the Salmon of Wisdom. At this point we will begin to discover the most disturbing mysteries and legends of Belfast. We will discover all the secrets about the Celtic festival of Samhain , origin of the world-famous celebration of Halloween.

Afterwards, we will enter the streets of the Cathedral Quarter to "get lost" in the oldest streets of Belfast.

​

We will continue to discover the mysteries and legends of Belfast in other well-known places in the city, such as the Smithfield market, the Central Library and the neighborhood of the Cathedral of Saint Anne, in front of which we will learn the story of a drunk and troublemaker, who fled from his cell shaken by the presence in his dungeon of a gloomy ghost... Do you know what decision the judge took in the face of this fact?


The best quality is guaranteed on our tour because it is tip-based. Your guide does not receive any payment from the city or company, but will accept a tip at the end of the tour if you wish to leave one. Please feel free to leave a tip according to your budget and according to how much you enjoyed the tour

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end

name: Free Walking Tour  of Belfast  (Available in Spanish)
description:
The Free Walking Tour Belfast is the best way to get to know the city. It is not the typical free tour: our philosophy is that you feel as if a lifelong friend is showing you the city.

 Apart from going through the history of Belfast through the most emblematic places, we will pass by a pub with murals inside where anyone who wants to learn how to pour a Guinness on the tap . Also after the tour we usually visit a hidden old republican Irish pub. Other days we go to eat little fish. To your liking! The tour includes:

- The Crown Liquor Saloon
 -Europe Hotel
 -Ulster Hall.
 -Assembly rooms.
 - Belfast City Council.
 - Majestic guides.
 -Titanic Memorial.
 - The onion rings (Spirit of Belfast).
 - The Pub area. Here, except on Sundays, we usually go in to see murals while they teach us to pour Guinness.
-Albert's Clock.
- Big Fish.

Note: it seems like a 6 and a half hour walk, but everything is next door.

Note 2: Those who do not want to drink Guinness can have coffee or non-alcoholic options. The best thing about the Pub is its mural area!

Note 3 : The pub is only open during morning tour hours. In the afternoon we end up at the republican irish pub, where they will only teach us how to pour Guinness if the bar is not full.

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end

name: Essential Free Walking Tour of Belfast (Available in English, Spanish)
description:
The best opportunity to discover Belfast, with the best guides in the city. In this Free walking tour of Belfast you will get to know famous and essential places such as: 
• The Docklands & The Lagan River 
• Cathedral Quarter 
• Albert Clock 
• The Big Fish 
• Belfast City Hall 
• City Laneways

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end
